snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg discussed topics including the roots of partisanship in Congress and the Republican presidential primary.
abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg discussed topics including the roots of partisanship in Congress and the Republican presidential primary.
lead_paragraph: An unusually analytic Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg on Friday reflected on the political landscape, describing in a radio interview why he tries to support Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, revealing an interest in the presidential candidacy of Jon Huntsman, and theorizing that the rise of air travel has contributed to the decline of bipartisanship in Washington.

headline.main: On Radio, Mayor Shares Wide-Ranging Thoughts on Politics
